data.description: Functions calculating upper and lower bounds
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The Finance::Shares modules together form a toolkit for analysing
    stock market trends.

    Finance::Shares::Bands provides several methods extending the
    Finance::Shares::Sample object. They calculate upper and lower
    boundary lines for channels, envelopes and Bollinger bands.
